name: Remove Bing Search Gradient
description: Update 1.2: Updated to remove gradient of new image preview pane on main search results. Please update. Update 1.1: Updated to remove gradient on table of contents results, such as Wikipedia previews when compact mode is disabled. Please update. This theme removes the new gradient effect Microsoft is adding to some searches. This gradient conflicts with the Dark Reader extension, and sometimes bugs out leaving an empty space between the page header. That's what this theme fixes.
